param.name: pszFile
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: uFlags
param.para: Specifies return flags to get icon location.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the registry key from which to load the "DefaultIcon" value.

param.name: hkey
param.para: A handle to the registry key.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: It is recommended that any call to IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetKey come before any calls to the SetXxxIcon methods.

param.name: pszFile
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the icon that allows containers to specify an "open" look.

param.name: pszFile
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the icon for a shortcut to the object.

param.name: pszFile
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods to set default icons associated with an object.
